scripts.setup-consul: curl -X PUT -d ${MYSQL_DATABASE} http://${HOST_IP}:8500/v1/kv/servicenow-integration/db-init/database ; curl -X PUT -d 'root' http://${HOST_IP}:8500/v1/kv/servicenow-integration/db-init/user ; curl -X PUT -d ${MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD} http://${HOST_IP}:8500/v1/kv/servicenow-integration/db-init/password ; curl -X PUT -d 'true' http://${HOST_IP}:8500/v1/kv/servicenow-integration/db-init/populate-test-data ; curl -X PUT -d ${REDIS_AUTH} http://${HOST_IP}:8500/v1/kv/servicenow-integration/redis/password
